body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Timothy Kelly and the customer's name is Maria Parker.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'm with Bright Solutions, how can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, I'm looking for some help with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I'd be happy to help with that. May I start by getting your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. To better assist you, could you please provide your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's six five one, two three four, five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thanks for that! And could you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, John. I will look into your account right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, John. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out.
